facts.text: Karol Swiderski was the top goalscorer for the team in both the 2022 and 2023 seasons, scoring 10 and 12 goals respectively.
The team's highest average attendance was in the 2023 season, with 36,337 spectators.
In the 2024 season, Patrick Agyemang was the top goalscorer with 10 goals.
The team finished 5th in the conference and 11th overall in the 2024 season.
Dean Smith became the head coach of the team on December 12, 2023.
Ashley Westwood has been the captain of the team since 2023.
The team reached the Quarter Finals (QF) of the Leagues Cup in 2023.
Christian Lattanzio served as an interim coach from May 31, 2022, to October 26, 2022, before being appointed as the head coach until November 8, 2023.
The team's playoff result in 2023 was reaching the Wild Card stage.
The team did not compete in the US Open Cup (USOC) in the 2024 season.
